TEXT.TITLE: FHLBB CHANGES SHORT-TERM DISCOUNT NOTE RATES
TEXT.BODY: The Federal Home Loan Bank Board adjusted the rates on its short-term discount notes as follows: MATURITY NEW RATE OLD RATE MATURITY 30-273 days 5.00 pct 5.00 pct 30-89 days 274-294 days 5.92 pct 5.83 pct 90-100 days 295-344 days 5.00 pct 5.00 pct 101-181 days 345-360 days 5.93 pct 5.82 pct 182-195 days 5.00 pct 196-274 days 5.90 pct 275-295 days 5.00 pct 296-360 days Reuter
